GAUDMM.name: Gauss Rifle Damage Enhancement
GAUDMM.description: The Gauss Rifles of this Battlemech are more potent.

GAUEXR.name: Gauss Rifle Extended Range
GAUEXR.description: The Gauss Rifles of this Battlemech are more effective at longer ranges.

GAUVEL.name: Gauss Rifle Velocity Enhancement
GAUVEL.description: The Gauss Rifles of this Battlemech have higher velocity.

GAUSPR.name: Gauss Rifle Spread Upgrade

GAUCLD.name: Gauss Rifle Cycling Enhancement
GAUCLD.description: The Gauss Rifles of this Battlemech have faster cycling times.

BALGAB.description: The Gauss Coils installed on this mech have been bypassed, lowering the damage and range of each shot, but greatly increasing the rate of fire of the weapon system.

GAUHEV.description: This 'Mech was used as a testbed for the creation of Heavy Gauss Rifles and the gauss rifles installed to it retain those upgrades.

BALGAR.description: The previous owner of this mech overhauled the Gauss Rifle coils and capacitors to massively increase damage and speed, at the cost of an ungodly charge time.

GAUHAG.name: HAG Lengthened Barrel

BALLRF.description: This mech is installed with larger barrels and enhanced feed mechanisms, enabling much greater rates of fire with LB-X Autocannons at the cost of damage, speed, and spread.

BALSND.name: Sandblaster

MACALL.name: Machine Gun Enhancement

BALMGR.name: Machine Gun Range Extension

BALMGRF.name: Machine Gun Feed Overhaul
BALMGRF.description: The Machine Guns of this mech fire far faster, but can carry less ammo.

RFLALL.name: Rifle Enhancement
RFLALL.description: The Rifles of this Battlemech are all around better.

RFLHET.name: Rifle Cool Run

RFLDMM.name: Rifle Damage Enhancement
RFLDMM.description: The Rifles of this Battlemech are more potent.

RFLEXR.name: Rifle Extended Range

RFLVEL.name: Rifle Velocity Enhancement
RFLVEL.description: The Rifles of this Battlemech have higher velocity.

RFLSPR.name: Rifle Spread Upgrade

RFLCLD.name: Rifle Cycling Enhancement
RFLCLD.description: The Rifles of this Battlemech have faster cycling times.

BALRFL.name: Rifle Tuning
BALRFL.description: The Rifles of this 'mech are tuned to fire faster and hit harder, at the cost of increased heat generation.

BALLIR.name: Light Rifle Tuning
BALLIR.description: This mech is tuned to better utilize light rifles, drastically decreasing their cycle time at the cost of increased heat.

BALMRF.name: Medium Rifle Tuning
BALMRF.description: This mech is tuned to better utilize medium rifles, increasing their damage and ammo capacity at the cost of increased heat.

BALHRF.name: Heavy Rifle Tuning
BALHRF.description: This mech is tuned to better utilize heavy rifles, decreasing their heat, while increasing the amount of ammo this mech can carry for them.

IMPSNS.name: Improved Sensors
IMPSNS.description: This Chassis has improved sensor efficiency.

SCOUT.name: Scout Mech
SCOUT.description: This 'Mech was designed as a scout.

LAMFCK.name: Land Air Mech
LAMFCK.description: This Chassis has improved sensor efficiency.

SHTRAK.name: DMCA'd by the Clans
SHTRAK.description: This mech suffered a lawsuit from a certain clan during its development, thus the engineers had to cut some corners to get it out the door without losing all their shit.

AMSOVER.name: Overtuned AMS
AMSOVER.description: For getting revenge on the missiles that busted down your door and shot your dog.

BZRBOT.name: Berzerkbot
BZRBOT.description: The Berserker was desgined as a close range brawler and is more effective in melee.

BZRARM.name: Berzerker Endurance
BZRARM.description: The Berserker was designed as a close range brawler and is loaded with more armor for increased survivability.

FAFNIR.name: Gauss Rifle Platform
FAFNIR.description: The Fafnir was designed as a stable mid range fire support platform.

HERTDK.name: The Final Throes
HERTDK.description: The Death Knell is a fearsome legend, and deserves to be feared - especially when you feel the fires of hell beneath your CT...

TARRFL.name: Rifleman Targeting Computer
TARRFL.description: The Rifleman has one of the most advanced targeting and tracking computers ever built, and the design was often stolen by pirates, salvagers, and the Solaris VII arena's top 'mech creators to use in other designs. As such, it provides bonuses to both sensor range and to the ability to predict ballistic trajectories on the fly.

TARPRE.name: Predictive Targeting Computer
TARPRE.description: This Battlemech Comes with an inbuilt Predictive Targeting Computer.

WARHMR.name: Inbuilt PPC Capacitors(Arms)

CRUSADER.name: Crusader

INCASE2.name: Inbuilt Case 2

ARMBLK.name: Black Knight Shield Arm

HERSTC.name: Heroic Defiance

HOHIRO1.description: Increased rate of fire and more damaging shells that fly faster at the cost of ammo carried per ton.

HOHIRO2.name: Hohiro SRM
HOHIRO2.description: Increased range, velocity, and more efficient heat generation, with more ammo per ton.

MAKER.name: Widowmaker
MAKER.description: 'Those who break faith with the Unity shall go down into darkness.'

MAKER2.name: Widowmaker Ballistic
MAKER2.description: Increased damage, velocity, and ammo capacity.

MAKER3.name: Widowmaker PPC
MAKER3.description: Increased rate of fire with much better heat exchangers.

CPACE.name: Carapace
CPACE.description: Watch and laugh as they fail to pierce your shell.

CPACE1.name: Carapace UAC
CPACE1.description: Increased rate of fire and velocity at the cost, with decreased jam chance, at the cost of range.

CPACE2.name: Carapace LRM
CPACE2.description: Greatly increased damage at the cost of reload times and heat load.

KAIJU.name: Kaiju
KAIJU.description: You are now contractually obligated to attack *NON-DESCRIPT JAPANESE CITY HERE*

KAIJU2.name: Kaiju UAC
KAIJU2.description: Increased damage and velocity at the cost of reload times, jam chance, and ammo capacity.

CALE.name: Cale
CALE.description: Recovered from Dieron and heavily retrofitted with Innersphere technologies, this Kodiak was the personal mech of Tai-sa Cale Schultz-Tanaka.

CALE1.name: Cale AC10
CALE1.description: Higher velocity and rate of fire at the cost of heat.

CALE2.name: Cale SRM
CALE2.description: Reduced heat and increased ammo capacity.

CALE3.name: Cale Energy
CALE3.description: Reduced duration and faster rate of fire at the cost of heat.

KILLROY1.name: Kill Roy LBX
KILLROY1.description: Faster rate of fire, better spread and velocity with higher ammo per ton.

KILLROY2.name: Kill Roy PPC
KILLROY2.description: Decreased heat and increased range and velocity.

KILLROY3.name: Kill Roy Energy
KILLROY3.description: Increased damage, decreased heat and duration.

FLOOF.name: Fluff
FLOOF.description: Don't let the soft fur fool you, this beast has claws.

FLOOF1.name: Fluff PPC
FLOOF1.description: I am become death, the destroyer of worlds.

ALPHA.name: Alpha
ALPHA.description: You are the first, make them the last.

ALPHA1.name: Alpha BF AC
ALPHA1.description: Greatly increased damage and velocity, under a smaller radius, ath the cost of reload times, and heat.

TORT.name: Tortoise
TORT.description: It doesn't matter if you're the slowest, they're all dead.

TORT1.name: Tortoise Torso HAG
TORT1.description: The torso mounted HAGs of this mech do much more damage at much higher velocity, at the cost of ammo per ton and cooldown times.

TORT2.name: Tortoise ARM HAG
TORT2.description: The arm mounted HAGs of this mech fire much faster and have greater ammo capacity at the cost of range and damage.

DHUNT1.name: DHunt AutoCannon
DHUNT1.description: Much deeper ammo reserves, with a faster rate of fire, better spread and velocity.

DHUNT2.name: DHunt Energy
DHUNT2.description: Faster cycling times with less heat.

LDYKLR1.name: Lady Killer RAC
LDYKLR1.description: Greatly increased rate of fire and velocity, with greatly decreased heat and jam chance.

LDYKLR2.name: Lady Killer M Laser
LDYKLR2.description: Increased damage and range over a longer duration.

LDYKLR3.name: Lady Killer MG
LDYKLR3.description: Extended range, ammo capacity, and rate of fire at the cost of damage.

BAN.name: Banned
BAN.description: 'OH MY GOD WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT!' - Unnamed Solaris Commentator

BAN2.name: Banned Thunderbolt
BAN2.description: Increased damage, and nullified minimum range.

RETRI.name: Reese's Retribution
RETRI.description: Rage is a hell of an anesthetic.

RETRI2.name: Reese's Retribution Missile
RETRI2.description: Increased damage, range, velocity, and ammo capacity.

BSWEND.name: Bushwacker Endurance
BSWEND.description: This Bushwacker comes equipped with more armor than would typically be on such a chassis.

OBSOLE.name: Obsolete
OBSOLE.description: This Mech is particularly hard to find parts for to repair.

PROTOT.name: Prototype
PROTOT.description: The components on this battlemech are less resilient due to lacking parts from full manufacturing production lines.

POORPF.name: Poor Performance
POORPF.description: This Battlemech Suffers from issues accelerating to its top speed quickly.

POORWRK.name: Poor Workmanship
POORWRK.description: Some manufacturers are sorely lacking in quality standards; as a result, equipment produced by such sources and cursed with the Poor Workmanship Quirk is one quality step lower than normal and any critical damage rolls against such units earn a bonus to reflect the increased chance of such units suffering damage.

OVERSZ.name: Oversized
OVERSZ.description: This Unit is much larger than others and has a hard time avoiding fire.

RELIC.name: Museum Relic
RELIC.description: WHY ARE THERE SIX PEDALS WHEN THERE'S ONLY TWO DIRECTIONS?!?!?!

NARROW.name: Narrow Profile
NARROW.description: The unit is constructed to present a very narrow or low profile to any incoming fire.

STEALTH.name: Stealth Armor
STEALTH.description: The Mech carries a Stealth Armor system, which allows it to reduce its radar signature and makes the 'Mech harder to target.

BEGIN.name: Starter Mech
BEGIN.description: Please be patient, student Mechwarrior on board.

POPTART.name: Poptart
POPTART.description: This 'Mech is filled with Gooey Goodness.

JJENH.name: Enhanced JumpJets
JJENH.description: The Jump Jets of this mech have been upgraded across the board.

JJFST.name: Mechanical JumpJets
JJFST.description: The Jump Jets of this mech have been converted to mechanical jump boosters, enabling quick maneuvering with low cooldowns between hops at the cost of vertical distance.

LNBREAK.name: Linebreaker
LNBREAK.description: This 'Mech was designed to break its enemy's lines and route them. To that end it was made faster and more agile, though at the cost of more internal damage should a shot pierce its armor.

ENGFST.name: Overtuned Engine
ENGFST.description: This mech was built for speed, not a brawl.

KILLPRT.name: Get Fucked Son
KILLPRT.description: Listen Son, I don't have to explain shit.

KILLPRT1.name: Get Fucked Linda
KILLPRT1.description: Listen Linda, I don't have to explain shit.

KILLPRT2.name: Get Fucked Susan
KILLPRT2.description: Listen Susan, I don't have to explain shit.

KILLPRT3.name: Get Fucked Brenda
KILLPRT3.description: Listen Brenda, I don't have to explain shit.

KILLPRT4.name: Get Fucked Karen
KILLPRT4.description: Listen Karen, I don't have to explain shit.

KDKBOT.name: Mama Bear
KDKBOT.description: The Clan Ghost Bear intended the claws of the Kodiak to be ceremonial, but that doesn't stop them from being lethal as a Mama Bear protecting her Cubs.

KGCARM.name: Lengthened Barrel(Arms)
KGCARM.description: The Arm mounted AutoCannons of this mech have lengthened barrels, causing shells fire to fly both faster and at greater range.

KGCKNG.name: Regent
KGCKNG.description: Pirates are Crab People. - Some unknown pirate probably

PRTPPI.name: Pirate Mech PPI
PRTPPI.description: PPI Pirate Mechs may be deployed to over ~50% Maximum Tonnage.

PRTPPII.name: Pirate Mech PPII
PRTPPII.description: PPII Pirate Mechs may be deployed to over ~100% Maximum Tonnage.

PRTPPIII.name: Pirate Mech PPIII
PRTPPIII.description: PPII Pirate Mechs may be deployed to over ~200% Maximum Tonnage.

PRTPPV.name: Pirate Mech PPV
PRTPPV.description: Why do I hear boss music?

PRTLORD.name: Pirate Lord
PRTLORD.description: This mech has an uncapped tonnage limits; if you're not cheating, you're not trying.

LIGMA.name: Clanbuster
LIGMA.description: Clanbuster? More like bust my nuts.

SLDFR.name: Star League Relic
SLDFR.description: The Star League Defense Force used the best tech of their time, as such, relics of that time enjoy increased performance with their mechs.

CLNBST.name: Clanbuster
CLNBST.description: A ComStar designed refit for the Battle of Tukayyid, featuring the latest tech to withstand against the Clans.

SPITE.name: WHAT THE HELL EVEN IS THAT

WEAK-HEAD-1.name: Weak Head Armor (1)
WEAK-HEAD-1.description: This 'Mech's cockpit is more fragile than normal, and all shots against its armor deal more damage.

WEAK-HEAD-2.name: Weak Head Armor (2)
WEAK-HEAD-2.description: This 'Mech has less potential and maximum armor protecting its cockpit than typical

WEAK-LEGS.name: Weak Legs
WEAK-LEGS.description: This 'Mech has legs that buckle under pressure.

EXP-ACTUATOR.name: Exposed Actuators
EXP-ACTUATOR.description: This 'Mech has fragile ankle actuators making it an easier target for leg attacks

EXPOSED-LINKAGE.name: Exposed Weapon Linkage
EXPOSED-LINKAGE.description: This 'Mech has fragile arm actuators making it an easier target for arm attacks

EXPOSED-LINKAGERT.name: Exposed Weapon Linkage (RT)
EXPOSED-LINKAGERT.description: This 'Mech has an exposed ammo feed in its right torso, making attacks against is more punishing.

POOR-LIFE-SUPPORT.name: Poor Life Support
POOR-LIFE-SUPPORT.description: This 'Mech has reduced defenses for the pilot
